entry.title: Regional route solution proposed to Baku, Pashinyan says

media:group.media:title: Regional route solution proposed to Baku, Pashinyan says
media:group.media:description:
üìç Prominent Swedish climate activist Greta Thunberg arrived in Armenia and spoke at a public discussion in Yerevan amid her boycott of the COP29 climate conference in Baku. üìç U.S. President-elect Donald Trump confirmed that Senator Marco Rubio will be the next U.S. Secretary of State. üìç Armenian serviceman Narek Grigoryan was found dead on duty yesterday, marking the 16th non-combat death in Armenia's armed forces this year. üìç ‚ÄòPutin is trying to revive not the Soviet Union but rather the imperial Russia of the Tsars‚Äô: https://www.civilnet.am/en/news/805497/putin-is-trying-to-revive-not-the-soviet-union-but-rather-the-imperial-russia-of-the-tsars/

entry.title: Armenia‚Äôs defense budget reaches record high

media:group.media:title: Armenia‚Äôs defense budget reaches record high
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of Insights, host Eric Hacopian examines Armenia's defense budget for 2025, the highest in the country's history. He discusses what this signals about the government's security priorities. He then delves into the findings of a recent International Republican Institute poll that provides insights into the hopes, fears, and disappointments of the Armenian public across a range of issues.

entry.title: Greta Thunberg on COP29: Greenwashing Azerbaijan's Extreme Human Rights Abuses and Ethnic Cleansing

media:group.media:title: Greta Thunberg on COP29: Greenwashing Azerbaijan's Extreme Human Rights Abuses and Ethnic Cleansing
media:group.media:description:
Environmental activist Greta Thunberg participated in a conference examining the intersection of human rights and environmental protection in relation to Azerbaijan's actions. The event, titled 'The Impact of Azerbaijan's Aggression on Human Rights and Environmental Protection,' was held at the American University of Armenia as an independent side event parallel to COP29. During the conference, Thunberg criticized the United Nations' decision to select Azerbaijan, a nation heavily dependent on petroleum exports, as the host country for its climate summit, describing the choice as 'extreme hypocrisy.'

entry.title: COP29 √† Bakou: Entre violations des droits de l‚Äôhomme et exploitation p√©troli√®re et gazi√®re

media:group.media:title: COP29 √† Bakou: Entre violations des droits de l‚Äôhomme et exploitation p√©troli√®re et gazi√®re
media:group.media:description:
La Conf√©rence sur les changements climatiques de cette ann√©e, la COP29, s‚Äôest ouverte le 11 novembre √† Bakou en Azerba√Ødjan. La conf√©rence internationale des Nations Unies a pour objectif de mesurer les progr√®s accomplis aux changements climatiques et ce qu‚Äôil reste √† faire.
Le choix de Bakou a fait beaucoup de remous en raison du fait que l‚Äô√©conomie du pays d√©pend fortement des exportations de p√©trole et de gaz. C√¥t√© droits de l‚Äôhomme, l‚ÄôAzerba√Ødjan est accus√© de violations en tout genre, notamment de la d√©tention de prisonniers de guerre arm√©niens.
Pour Ga√Ødz Minassian, journaliste pour le journal Le Monde et professeur en relations internationales √† l‚Äôuniversit√© de Science Po, le choix de l‚ÄôAzerba√Ødjan est, en outre, un avertissement quant √† la politique autoritaire men√©e par Ilham Aliyev.

entry.title: Georgia offers to mediate Armenia-Azerbaijan talks

media:group.media:title: Georgia offers to mediate Armenia-Azerbaijan talks
media:group.media:description:
üìç Georgia‚Äôs prime minister, Irakli Kobakhidze, declared in Baku today that Tbilisi is eager to take on a more active role in facilitating negotiations between Armenia and Azerbaijan. üìç Senior diplomats from Armenia and Hungary met in Budapest for their first bilateral talks since restoring diplomatic relations. üìç Armenia's Defense Minister Suren Papikyan announced that Armenia will not use force to reclaim its internationally recognized territory occupied by Azerbaijan. üìç First cat cruelty arrest in Armenia sparks discussion on animal rights: civilnet.am/en/news/805100/first-cat-cruelty-arrest-in-armenia-sparks-discussion-on-animal-rights/
